long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Save and organize your favorite websites effortlessly with the Symbaloo Bookmarker extension. As you browse the web, this handy tool allows you to instantly save any website or link directly to your Symbaloo Webmixes. No more lost bookmarks or scattered links ‚Äì keep all your digital resources neatly organized and accessible in one place. Ideal for educators, students, and professionals, the Symbaloo Bookmarker ensures that your essential online tools and resources are always just a click away. Simplify your digital life and enhance productivity with Symbaloo‚Äôs user-friendly bookmarking solution.

The Symbaloo Bookmarker connects directly to your Personal Symbaloo account, where they are stored safely for later use.

Bookmarking can be easily done for the page you are visiting with the icon in the Browser Toolbar. Alternatively you can bookmark and link with a right click on the link which will open en contextMenu to save the link.

About Symbaloo

With Symbaloo you surf with one click to all of your favorite websites.

Symbaloo is an easy-to-use online application and best of all, it‚Äôs free. You will have all of your favorite websites at your fingertips, anywhere and always. Choose your favorite websites and within a few clicks, you can create your very own homepage. With an account, your favorites are available on any iPhone, PC, Mac, iPad, and tablet. Wherever you go, you always have access to your favorite websites. 

In 2024 over 6 million people are using Symbaloo as their homepage!

The main advantages are:

long.de,fr:
Save, organize and share all your bookmarks in a personalized and safe online environment. Make your online life easier by keeping all your favorite websites organized together in one place and accessible at any time, on any device.

With the Symbaloo Bookmarker you can easily add the website you are visiting to your Symbaloo account by just clicking the extension button that appears on your browser.

The Symbaloo Bookmarker connects directly to your Personal Symbaloo account, where they are stored safely for later use.

New in the latest versions of the extension is bookmarking any link on a website with a right-click. This will open a contextMenu giving the option to select where you want to store the Bookmark.
long.es:
Guarda, organiza y comparte tus marcadores en un entorno en l√≠nea √∫nico y seguro. Haz que tu vida en internet sea m√°s f√°cil al tener todos tus sitios web favoritos organizados juntos en el mismo lugar y siempre accesibles en cualquier momento o dispositivo.

Con el Bookmarker de Symbaloo podr√°s a√±adir f√°cilmente el sitio web en el que est√°s navegando a tu cuenta de Symbaloo con tan s√≥lo pulsar el bot√≥n que aparece en la esquina de tu navegador.
long.nl:
Met de Symbaloo Bookmarker kun je de website die je bezoekt eenvoudig toevoegen aan jouw Symbaloo-account door op de extensieknop te klikken die in jouw browser verschijnt.

Bewaar, organiseer en deel al jouw bladwijzers in een persoonlijke en veilige online omgeving. Maak je online leven eenvoudiger door al je favoriete websites op √©√©n plek bij elkaar te houden.

De Symbaloo Bookmarker verbind direct met jouw persoonlijke Personal Symbaloo account, waar de bookmarks elk moment gebruikt kunnen worden.

De laatst toegevoegde functie is het kunnen bookmarken van elke link op een website met een rechter muis-klik.
